glsa.title: VirtualBox: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in VirtualBox, the worst of which might allow unauthorized changes to some critical or all accessible data.

background.p: VirtualBox is a powerful virtualization product from Oracle.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in VirtualBox. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: An attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition. Additionally, an attacker could create, delete or modify critical or all accessible data.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All VirtualBox users should upgrade to the latest version:
